description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Use your attack helicopter to destroy the headquarters of The Smog before time runs out in 8 action packed missions.  Use tactics and strategy to fight enemies from land, sea, and air.
description.short: Use your attack helicopter to destroy the headquarters of The Smog before time runs out in 8 action packed missions.  Use tactics and strategy to fight enemies from land, sea, and air.
